```{r}
Chargement des données 
```{r}
setwd("C:/Users/fanny/OneDrive/Documents/Cours/PenseeCritique/Presences_2024")
d1<- read.csv2("export1_2024_r.csv")
d2<- read.csv2("export2_2024_r.csv")
d4<- read.csv2("export4_2024_r.csv") # RMQ : pas de d3 car absente cours 3
d5<- read.csv2("export5_2024_r.csv")
```

Faire le tableau agrégé
```{r}
d.complet <- merge(d1, d2, by = "NumEtudiant")
d.complet <- merge(d.complet, d4, by = "NumEtudiant")
d.complet <- merge(d.complet, d5, by = "NumEtudiant")
head(d.complet)

colnames(d.complet)
d.complet<- d.complet[,c("NumEtudiant", "Nom.Usuel.x",       "Prénom.x","Validé.x"  )]

write.csv2(d.complet, file="presence2024.csv")
```
